channel.title: Question!
channel.description:
Ima going to buy shit. How much would that cost?
Okay, now seriously. I am going to buy a VPS for 24/7 servers, but now i have a question. Will 24/7's attract Jagex more then an non 24/7? I know i ask too much questions like this, but i am REALLY scared...

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

Wait, i found out i was looking at the wrong place. Is a desktop VPS with 10GB HDD good?

Read full topic

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:9, topic:353108”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=449421.msg3297240#msg3297240 date=1281032804]
You can use 10-20 if you want.
[/quote]
10-20 what? P.S. Will be 4 GB enough? Vps with 4 GB is cheapest i can get…[/quote]

10-20 gb, 4gb of HDD is nothing. You could fill that by just installing windows 10-20gb is enough to handle windows and anything else you need for hosting a server.

Read full topic

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:6, topic:353108”][quote author=someone2 link=topic=449421.msg3297217#msg3297217 date=1281031924]
SO much HDD?! That will cost me €100 EACH MONTH! I only want around the 20-30 players! By the way, i asked if a 24/7 508 server would take much attention of Jagex…
[/quote]

That also depends, if your hosting a website with a web client it might, but also if your taking in donations then you will get there attention.[/quote]
It is an downloadable client, there is nothing like grandexchange, smithing doesn’t work, no donation thingys…

By the way, how much HDD will it cost for 20-30 players?

Read full topic

item.title: Question!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

someone2:

I am going to use rs4ever 508 on a 24/7, will that take much attention of Jagex?

Depends on what your doing. I would say if you want the most efficient server, go with a 1-2gb linux, with at least 25-50gbs of HDD and a decent amount of internet speed, 100mps is the average for most.

Read full topic

Depends on what type of server source your using.

Hyperion, CZAR, Delta, PI, RS377, others.
